title: Sarah Keyworth • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #91
itunes:title: Sarah Keyworth • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #91
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the truly fantastic and funny comedian, writer, podcaster and general multi-threat SARAH KEYWORTH!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the truly fantastic and funny comedian, writer, podcaster and general multi-threat SARAH KEYWORTH!


A follow on from your previous week's guest, dear listener, as Sarah is the partner of Catherine Bohart and together they host the insanely great 'You'll Do Podcast. In fact I barely had to change last week’s intro paragraph above as it is perfectly fitting! It’s a treat to catch Brett and Sarah in conversation, again in isolation as we deal with the current ongoing situation, and there’s some real nice up top chat about coping in the behind closed doors way in which many of us are. She nails it by referring to the mix of Blitz spirit and despair, but things don’t end there by any means - we hear about how okay her partner is (no really, she’s fine!), the fact that standups face a unique situation in not having that audience feedback of a crowd (which leads to a fantastic idea about doing cold-call crowd work), and of course you get the usual unique observations about life, love, death, the afterlife or lack thereof and all of that good good stuff.

A winner, folks. Love it.


LINKS FOR THIS EPISODE:

SARAH on TWITTER!

SARAH on INSTAGRAM!

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER!

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on PATREON!

SUPERBOB - Brett's 2015 feature film!

CORNERBOYS with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP!

DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM
